question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. grey motorcycle
B. green fruits
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The grey motorcycle is in the foreground, clearly closer to the camera than the green fruits, which are on the far left side of the road in the background.
